mapper.sql: id, auction_id,car_card,cc_province, cc_province_id, cc_city, cc_city_id, cc_area, cc_area_id, car_card_address, `key`, spare_key,k_province, k_province_id, k_city, k_city_id, k_area, k_area_id, key_address, key_remark, s_province, s_province_id, s_city, s_city_id, s_area, s_area_id,store_address, store_space, store_time, trailer_cost, trailer_cost_pay, voucher_id,trailer_phone, origin_province, origin_province_id, origin_city, origin_city_id, origin_address, distance, destination_province, destination_province_id, destination_city, destination_city_id, destination_address, car_status, gearbox_type, car_mileage, vin_is_damage, engine, gearbox, waterbox, condenser, battery, aircondition_pump, motor, power_steering_pump, dynamo, ABS_pump, three_way_catalytic_converter, exhaust_pipe, compressor, right_front_headlight, right_mirror, right_front_door, right_rear_door, right_rear_tail_light, left_front_headlight, left_mirror, left_front_door, left_rear_door, left_rear_tail_light, trunk, spare_tire, vehicle_tools, triangle_indicator, trim, dashboard, seat, DVD_CD, voicebox, engine_computer, gearbox_computer, driving_computer, burglar_computer, gasbag_computer, entertainment_computer, trouble_description, maintenance_manual, operating_manual, tyre_num, dismantling, dismantling_part, two_accidents, two_accidents_remark, refit, refit_part, check_part, no_check_park, receiving_part, remark, salesman, audit_state,is_warehouse,is_print,out_stock_time, is_delete, create_time,update_time
mapper.select: select cpw.*,ta.storage_path voucher_path,ta.original_name voucher_name from car_pm_warehouse cpw left join tb_attachment ta on cpw.voucher_id = ta.id where cpw.id = #{id}

select cpw.*,ta.storage_path voucher_path,ta.original_name voucher_name from car_pm_warehouse cpw left join tb_attachment ta on cpw.voucher_id = ta.id where cpw.auction_id = #{auctionId} AND cpw.is_warehouse=1 and cpw.is_delete = 0

select cpw.*,ta.storage_path voucher_path,ta.original_name voucher_name from car_pm_warehouse cpw left join tb_attachment ta on cpw.voucher_id = ta.id where cpw.auction_id = #{auctionId} AND cpw.is_warehouse=-1 and cpw.is_delete = 0

vin_is_damage = #{vinIsDamage},

aircondition_pump = #{airconditionPump},

where id = #{id}
